Source code for nukebridge.executors.simpleexecutor

from nukebridge.executors.core.baseexecutor import BaseExecutor




[docs]
class SimpleExecutor(BaseExecutor):
    """
    SimpleExecutor is a class that inherits from the BaseExecutor class.
    It is used to execute simple tasks.
    """

    def __init__(self):
        """
        Constructor method for the SimpleExecutor class.
        Calls the constructor of the BaseExecutor class.
        """
        super().__init__()



[docs]
    def setup_parser(self):
        """
        Method to set up the parser.
        Calls the setup_parser method of the BaseExecutor class.
        """
        super().setup_parser()





[docs]
    def run(self):
        """
        Method to run the executor.
        Calls the run method of the BaseExecutor class.
        """
        super().run()
